scripts.size: node -e "let fs=require('fs'); let b=fs.statSync('.serverless/net23.zip').size; console.log('serverless bundle net23.zip is '+b.toLocaleString()+' bytes')"
scripts.deploy-after: yarn --cwd ../ seal set-local && yarn --cwd ../ test && yarn size
scripts.deploy: yarn deploy-before && serverless deploy && yarn deploy-after
scripts.vzip-size: node -e "let fs=require('fs'); let b=fs.statSync('vzip/.serverless/net23.zip').size; console.log('vzip serverless bundle net23.zip is '+b.toLocaleString()+' bytes')"
